description:
A simple way to create a pulse on a specific element targeted by its's ID

We can also talk if there if you want a custom one, just shoot an email to clasicwebtools [@] gmail.com

Check it out at https://bubble.io/page?type=page&name=pulse&id=clasic-plugins&test_plugin=1667413866091x381347285564129300_current&tab=tabs-1
name: Pulse an Element
plugin_instructions:
1 - Download the plugin
2 - set the element ID
3 - implement on your page
